title: Connectors are not binding to their ports in Catalina.load(), but only later in start()
description:
When testing with trunk at revision 957942 and potentially affecting version 7.0.0, it was discovered that Connectors are not binding to their ports in Catalina.load(), but only later in start(). This is different from TC6 where there is a separate prestartup phase when starting Tomcat to allow Connectors to bind to their ports before other parts of Tomcat are started. It seems that this change breaks the fix for BZ 48625.
